name: Hot Air Balloon Crate Delivery System Simulation: Deluxe Edition 2018
name_original: Hot Air Balloon Crate Delivery System Simulation: Deluxe Edition 2018
description:
Player 1: 
  • Burner - D, Joystick [Left]
  • Air Release - A, Joystick [Right]
Player 2:
  • Burner - Right, Joystick [Left]
  • Air Release - Left, Joystick [Right]

Be the first player to get the right amount of crates on your side!  

Any unintended crate movement is entirely the fault of the Balloon pilot.

Made for FaxJam 2018!
